resources.string:
Feel free to browse through four examples.
	 If you have any suggestions, for example idea of one more example, please, rise an issue in GitHub.
	 All presenters lifecycle methods are logged. Each presenter has random id, to help you identify this presenter in logs.
	 I recommend you to enable "Don't keep activities". So you can easily see when presenters are destoyed.
	 Btw, this activity doesn't retain presenter on purpose, check it out!
Example of retaining presenter for activity without fragments.
Example of retaining presenter for activity and fragment inside.
Example of retaining presenter for navigation with fragments. When you replace fragment with new one, old presenter is destroyed. Fragment has random background color to visualise "navigation".
Example with ViewPager. Activity contains fragment with nested fragments inside viewpager. Nested fragments has random background color, to visualise page changes
Example with ViewPager. Activity contains fragment with nested fragments inside viewpager. Nested fragments has random background color, to visualise page changes
